.. _mscstat:

mscstat: Image statistics on mosaic image extensions
====================================================

**Package: msctools**

.. raw:: html

  <section id="s_synopsis">
  <h3>Synopsis</h3>
  <p>
  This tasks computes image statistics, using <b>imstat</b>, by expanding
  each mosaic file into image extensions.  Image sections are allowed
  in the mosaic filenames.
  </p>
  </section>
  <section id="s_usage_">
  <h3>Usage	</h3>
  <p>
  mscstat images
  </p>
  </section>
  <section id="s_parameters">
  <h3>Parameters</h3>
  </section>
